article.title: U.S. Air Force Awards $475 Million for Paveway II Technology
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Corporation, Archbold, Pennsylvania, and Raytheon Missile Systems of Tucson, Arizona, are being awarded a $475 million firm-fixed-price contract for Paveway II laser-guided bomb computer control groups (seekers) and GBU-12 air foil groups (tail kits).Â The Ogden Air Logistics Center, Hill Air Force Base, Utah, is the contracting activity.
